alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:50AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shoshone, northwestern Benewah and southeastern Kootenai Counties through 115 AM PDT... At 1249 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harrison, or 11 miles northwest of St. Maries, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Maries, Pinehurst, Plummer, Harrison, Parkline, Fourth Of July Pass, Worley, Medimont, Kingston, Chatcolet, Beauty Creek Campground, Wolf Creek Campground, Rose Lake and Cataldo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 21 and 45. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 394 and 404. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse
